Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Capital City in 1985...
Had first career hit on 6/4/1985, off Brian Martin (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/1985, off Jason Bellantoni (WT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Pontiac on 9/20/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1989, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1989, hitting .307 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/1/1990 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/15/1991 to a 5-year deal worth $5,545,000 per year...
